thread.title: Walmart: FREE Baby Welcome Box (Available Again)
thread.title_full: Walmart: FREE Baby Welcome Box (Available Again)

author: Angela (Super Saver Sidekick)
title: Walmart: FREE Baby Welcome Box (Available Again)
text:
This is back if you missed it before! Head over to Walmart.com to request a FREE Baby Welcome Box . Once the page fully loads, simply click on the box that states “ Welcome Box – Sign Up Now ” (as shown below) and fill out the form. Even sweeter, this box ships for FREE! Allow up to five weeks for delivery of your free sample box.

If you are on a mobile device and having issues, you may need to switch to a desktop in order to request this freebie. Also try swapping web browsers if you are having problems as some readers are only able to snag this freebie in Chrome or Firefox. 

Check out what Hip2Save readers had to say about their boxes… “I loved that they have the little tubes of diaper cream, they are perfect for my diaper bag!” “Just received my Baby Box today – I got Baby Aquaphor soap, a sample of dish detergent and several other samples. Thanks for posting!” “I just got the box in the mail today! It came with a little cloth diaper holder/ clutch with a diaper and 6 wipes, all dryer sheets, Bio-Oil, Cetaphil baby wash and shampoo, Burt’s Bees baby, Dapple bottle cleaner sample, and Cera Ve healing ointment.” (Thanks, Savings Done Simply !)
